thread.title: Theo Walcott signs Sutton players’ shirts in dressing room after Arsenal’s routine FA Cup victory at Gander Green Lane
thread.title_full: Theo Walcott signs Sutton players’ shirts in dressing room after Arsenal’s routine FA Cup victory at Gander Green Lane

author: gboulton
title: Theo Walcott signs Sutton players’ shirts in dressing room after Arsenal’s routine FA Cup victory at Gander Green Lane
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments THEO WALCOTT signed Sutton players’ shirts in the home dressing room at Gander Green Lane following their memorable FA Cup win. 
The 27-year-old scored his 100th goal for Arsenal in the 2-0 victory and spent time with his non-league opposition after the game. 1 Theo Walcott signed shirts for Sutton United players after the FA Cup clash 
Despite their defeat, Sutton gave a good account of themselves against the Premier League side as their players looked upbeat in the dressing room. 
Walcott can be seen surrounded by Sutton players in the centre of the room as he is signing a player’s top. 
As well as giving players his autograph, the England international shook their hands and posed for photos. 
Fans praised Walcott on Twitter for his top-notch gesture. Walcott in the Sutton dressing room signing shirts and congratulating all the players – good stuff. 
— Tommy Burton (@TommyBurtonAFC) February 20, 2017 Class act from Theo after the match going into Sutton's dressing room, shaking every player's hand, signing autographs and taking pictures. 
— Aly Taha (@TheRealTata) February 20, 2017 Sutton United 0-2 Arsenal : Sutton’s magical FA Cup run is ended in gritty encounter Theo going into the Sutton dressing room to greet players was just class. @Arsenal #SuttonvArsenal 
— Silent Observer (@abs2ray) February 20, 2017 Touch of class by Theo Walcott, going to the Sutton changing room and shaking hands with every player... prem needs more players like him Related stories Five things we learnt Sutton 0 Arsenal 2: Theo Walcott scored his 100th goal to remind Arsene Wenger of scoring prowess DREAM TEAM RATINGS Sutton United v Arsenal: See who shone as the part-timers made Gunners work hard for victory He Shaw is hungry Sutton back-up keeper Wayne Shaw gives fans a laugh as he's caught chomping down on a pie HEADS HELD HIGH Sutton 0 Arsenal 2: United's magical FA Cup run ends as Theo Walcott bags his 100th club goal in gritty encounter FA Cup live Sutton 0 Arsenal 2: Theo Walcott scores his 100th Gunners goal to add to Lucas Perez's opener at non-league side 'No class' Arsenal slammed after captain Theo Walcott embarrassingly forgets to exchange pennant with Sutton skipper ahead of FA Cup clash Team News Sutton United vs Arsenal team news: Arsene Wenger set to risk reserves in must-win game at Gander Green lane sutton special A look at how many league places are between Sutton United and Arsenal and the non-league side's FA Cup record
